channel.title: Retribution death before a Hunter execution shows the Hunter's name/class
channel.description:
#### What happened?
I've seen this twice now. Exe'd a Hunter during daytime, and the Retribution death of the first accuser shows the Hunter's name/class in chat instead of the Retribution victim's. The Hunter's name/class shows again after their exe, so appears twice.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
Retribution death should show the Retribution victim's info in chat; Hunter death shows Hunter's
#### Steps to reproduce:
1) Accuse a Hunter 2) Exe a Hunter at trial 3) After the "arrow kill" sound, check chat.
EXP: [Retribution Victim's Name] was a [RV's Class] ACT: [Hunter's Name] was a Hunter
#### Comments:
Think this was new in 1.0.13
